projects.title: Cryptocurrency Alert System
description: Developed a microservice-based cryptocurrency alert system that continuously monitors real-time market data via WebSocket for selected coins.
Implemented a Ticker service to store cryptocurrency data in a sync.Map, processing each tick to calculate and publish max/min values to RabbitMQ for efficient message handling.
Created a Decider service that retrieves alert criteria from PostgreSQL, batches alerts for optimal dispatching, and sends them to the Notifier service for email notifications.
Utilized Redis caching to ensure efficient alert delivery by preventing redundant notifications, enhancing the overall user experience.
